### other templates {{< iconify fluent-mdl2:file-template style="color:#ffffff;" >}}

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="45%"}

[`AMS`](https://github.com/quarto-ext/typst-templates/tree/main/ams), [`poster`](https://github.com/quarto-ext/typst-templates/tree/main/poster) & [`dept--news`](https://github.com/quarto-ext/typst-templates/tree/main/dept-news) templates all contain scripting that is [not supported by the modern typst compiler](https://github.com/quarto-ext/typst-templates/issues/17) (version 0.13.0). 

:::

::: {.column width="55%" .smaller}

2 work--arounds:

+ amend scripting within `.typ` template (located in `_extensions` folder)
+ install [older version of Quarto](https://quarto.org/docs/download/) & compile as usual (v 1.6.43 works)

:::

## [[ümläüts]{.exo2}](https://coffeebreaklanguages.com/2023/11/everything-you-need-to-know-about-the-german-umlaut/) [[unicode]{.plainjane2}](https://symbl.cc/en/unicode-table/) [[&  uncials]{.uncial2}](https://www.britannica.com/topic/uncial)  

::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="33%" .fragment .semi-fade-out fragment-index=1}

### [Ümläüts](https://www.berlitz.com/blog/german-umlaut-meaning-letters):

[Numeric character references (NCRs)](https://www.w3schools.com/charsets/ref_html_entities_latin.asp) work across document types (typst, html, pdf).

For example, 

::: {style="text-align: center"}

`&#228;` = &#228; <br>`&auml;` = &auml;

:::

:::

::: {.column width="36%" .fragment .fade-in-then-semi-out fragment-index=1}

### [Unicode](https://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/search.htm):

Many possible characters -- 159,801 currently *assigned*\* (Unicode 17.0)

\*All NCRs *also* have unicode values:

::: {style="text-align: center"}

`&#x00e4;` = &#x00e4;

:::

:::

::: {.column width="31%" .fragment .fade-in fragment-index=2}

### [Uncials](https://spotlight.vatlib.it/latin-paleography/feature/7-1-use-and-characteristics-of-uncial):
